title: Where did you ride this year?
name: Where did you ride this year?

properties.name: 12-mile creek
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmap109 St. Paul Crescent, St. Catharines, OntarioTrail Starts at Renown Road above the marker. Single Track, Double Track. leads to Short Hills Conservation Area

properties.name: Albion Hills Conservation Area
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmap16500 Hwy 50, Bolton, Ontario, CanadaSite of a few 24hr races, great trails, very well marked and mapped

properties.name: Coaticook
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmap[177-305] Rue St Marc, Coaticook, Quebec, CanadaVery tactical trail with a lot of rocks, roots in the mountain. 28km of XC trails, intermediate to expert. A place in Quebec that must not be missed!!!

properties.name: Crested Butte
properties.description: Posted by YourmtbmapCrested Butte, COThis summer, I rode the Dyke Trail, Trail 401, and Doctors Park/Gunnison Spur of Colorado Trail. Fantastic!

properties.name: Fruita
properties.description: Posted by YourmtbmapFruita, CORode this year: Horsethief Bench, Chutes and Ladders, Joe\'s Ridge & more.

properties.name: Lake Tahoe, CA
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmapsouth lake tahoe, caa mirad of potential all around the lake. The rim trail from Tahoe meadows to the flume trail was my favorite

properties.name: Moab, Utah
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmapmoab, utahRode this year: Amasa Back, Bartlett Wash, Sovereign Trail, Porcupine Rim (twice), Klondike Bluffs.

properties.name: Monarch Crest
properties.description: Posted by YourmtbmapSalida, COMonarch Crest Trail, along the Continental Divide west of Salida. Spectacular riding and views!

properties.name: Rocky Point
properties.description: Posted by YourmtbmapRocky Point Rd, Rocky Point, NYLots and Lots of nice single track. plenty of fun black (some gray?) diamond side trails. pretty much anything you want is here!!

properties.name: Short Hills Conscervation Area
properties.description: Posted by Yourmtbmap1469 Pelham Rd., St. Catharines, ON Canada L2R 6P7Look South On Map. Good Multi-Use trails. Single-track and gravel double track. Some of the Single Track is quite challenging. Map boards posted to guide you.

properties.description: Posted by YourmtbmapMountain View, ARThe Syllamo trail system is about 7 miles north of Mountain View, Arkansas There are almost 50 miles of single track in this area.
